inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to provide written informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male or female >18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum HCV RNA levels of >1,000 IU per milliliter or higher
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Chronic Hepatitis C based on the judgment of the investigator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Indolent Non-Hodgkin's lymphoma , which may include the following : Nodal Marginal zone lymphoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine clearance ≥60 mL/min, as calculated by Cockcroft-Gault equation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Follicular lymphoma with large cell transformation
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Decompensated liver disease in which pegylated interferon is contraindicated.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Female who is pregnant or breast feeding and HCV treatment requires use of ribavirin.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN, and was diagnosed with Burkitt's lymphoma. They have undergone various treatments including pericardiocentesis, lumbar puncture, and bone marrow biopsy.
